name: Morning Star (itch) (tacecapS)
description:
Bash enemies with your morning star!

You are an antivirus program battling viruses in cyberspace with pure force! In this juicy, physics-based arcade game you will upgrade your abilities, max out your score and experience the visceral satisfaction of racking up insane combos!

Swing around your powerful weapon with your mouse and dodge out of the way with WASD.

 

Made for Juice Jam II with the theme "paying the price".

In Morning Star, you pay the price of achieving high scores by having to handle an increasingly unwieldy amount of juice.
